    const canvas = new OffscreenCanvas(100, 100);
    const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');

    ctx.fillStyle = 'teal';
    ctx.filter = new CanvasFilter({
        name: 'gaussianBlur',
        stdDeviation: [4, 0],
    });
    ctx.fillRect(25, 25, 50, 50);
